long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fi,fil,:
Connect Genie - Your Ultimate AI Assistant for LinkedIn engagement.

Leveraging OpenAI & ChatGPT, ConnectGenie assists you in:

- Crafting thoughtful comments, relevant to Linkedin posts that spark meaningful conversations and, YOU engage like a PRO!!.

- Writing personalised connect notes which are based on your prospect's :
   - Profile details or
   - Their most recent posts.
 Thus adding a higher level of personalisation, which significantly increase your chances of getting the connect request accepted.

- Highlighting Linkedin posts based on keywords that are relevant to your niche, which lets you:
  - Focus your engagement efforts where they truly belong.
  - Consume content efficiently.

- Saving tons of time in building your personal Linkedin brand effortlessly.

- It comes with pre packaged Tone Prompts which you can utilise to generate comments with a single click, but wait you are not restricted: You can even add your own custom tone prompts to fashion comments according to your style.

- Use GPT-4 model or GPT-3.5 to make the content as per your choice.
- Use the Referral Program to earn free 20 % connects.

Use different settings to control :
- What keywords you would like to include / exclude in your Linkedin Content.
- Choose word length.
- Add hashtags in your comments.
- See the sample prompts yourself and customise them to become the engagement King.

You get 50 free credits on signup and 25 free credits every month. 

So What are you waiting for? Use Connect Genie to build your personal brand you always wanted. 

Why you should use this tool for commenting?
Simple answer: Effortless Comment Generation

See, Every Linkedin Guru / Coach would instruct us to increase our engagement on Linkedin by commenting but, we mostly come up with comments like "Thanks for Sharing", "Well Said" or in some cases "Great". Do you think these comments actually add value for the readers? They dont! We need to come up with better comments and I know it's not always easy, it can take time. With Connect Genie Comment generation feature:
- You will have an insightful comment ready in a matter of seconds.
- You can engage with more prospects in less time.
- Increase Linkedin profile visibility.
- You ensure your voice is heard.

Why you should use this tool for personalised connect notes?

Answer this:
Would you not appreciate, if someone really puts in an effort to investigate your profile before they sent you a connect note? You would right.
That is because those efforts show the requester is genuinely interested in connecting with you. Same goes for your prospects.

But investigating each prospect's profile can take a lot of time, you would have to manually go through all the data points, now imagine if you had to do this everyday for 100s of prospects, Wow that is a lot time and efforts. 

With connect genie, a personalised connect request note gets generated in a blink of an eye that too with a single click. Our AI system analyses crucial details from your target's LinkedIn profile and generates a personalised connect note which captures attention, sparks meaningful conversation, and build genuine relationships effortlessly. 

-Tailor Your Networking Experience

Connect Genie puts you in control with its AI assistant capabilities. Customise your prompts and settings to align with your networking goals. Select keywords to include or exclude, set word limits, and even enable hashtags to maximise your comment's reach. Watch your engagement soar as Connect Genie, helps you leave your mark on LinkedIn's vibrant professional community.

- Unleash Your LinkedIn Potential by joining Connect Genie's online community on Facebook, where professionals share tips for brand building, content generation, engagement and you also get free give aways.

Note: Connect Genie offers free and premium plans, ensuring a flexible and tailored experience that suites you. Upgrade to unleash the full power of our AI-driven features.

Remember, great opportunities await those who connect strategically. Let Connect Genie, be your guide in the world of networking.

Install Connect Genie, today and let the magic begin!
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,he,mr,ms,:
What is ConnectGenie AI?

It's Your personal branding AI assistant for LinkedIn, BUT quite different.

Different how you may ask?

Well, what’s the biggest issue you face when using AI tools to create content?

- Robotic tone.
- AI-typical phrases
- Lack of personalisation
- Repetitive content.

But with ConnectGenie, AI meets persona and your Linkedin content gets written in YOUR unique writing style!

Our prominent features include:

- Persona enabled Viral Linkedin posts in 12 different languages.

- Intriguing hooks that compel your audience to click on the “See  more” button.

- Linkedin Post preview ( To see how your Linkedin post looks in different device settings before posting).

- Thought provoking comments written in your unique conversation style.

- Craft persona driven personalised connection request notes which can be either created:
        - By referring your prospect’s  Most recent Likedin posts 
         or 
        - By analysing your prospect’s unique Linkedin profile details.
 
- Discover relevant leads right within your LinkedIn feeds by highlighting posts with your niche specific keywords. This not only helps your find leads but also helps you focus your engagement efforts where they belong and enhances your content consumption on LinkedIn.

- Write customised job cover letters that highlight your skills and abilities exactly according to Job requirements.

- Multiple Persona support

- Persona can include both company and individual types: so you can also create content from your company’s Linkedin profile.  

- Support for All popular GPT models: GPT4 / GPT4o GPT3.5

- Use the Referral Program to earn free 20 % connects.
- You can even join our affiliate partner program to earn money with us.


Note: Connect Genie offers free and premium plans, ensuring a flexible and tailored experience that suits you. Upgrade to unleash the full power of our AI-driven features.

Remember, great opportunities await those who connect strategically. Let ConnectGenie, be your guide in the world of networking and Personal Branding.

Install ConnectGenie, today and let the magic begin!
